TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1922: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1928), 3 vols., Vol 2, pp. 591
TEI.2.document_title: John Cummings to Stephen F Austin, 08-24-1831

barker_notes.barker_summary: Austin in account with John Cummings, January 26, 1831. Price of lumber.
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 591

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*Austin in account with John Cummings, January 26, 1831. Price of lumber.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*Mill Creek*/location_mentioned* *date_mentioned n="01-26-1831">January 26th 1831*/date_mentioned**/p* *p**person_mentioned*S. F. Austin*/person_mentioned* To *person_mentioned*John Cummings */person_mentioned* Dr */p*
*p*To 106 1/2 feet of pine plank @ 5c------------$5.32 1/2*/p*
*p*" 955 do Oak flooring @ 3c-------------28.65*/p*
*p*" 1200 Do Sheeting plank @ 2c----------24.00*/p*
*p*$57.97 1/2*/p* *p**date_mentioned n="08-24-1831">August 24th 1831*/date_mentioned**/p*
*p*pr *person_mentioned*Mr Kennon*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*To 256 ft of damaged plank @ 1 1/2-------- 3.84*/p*
*p*144 do of do do @ 3c----------4.32*/p*
*p*$8.16*/p*
*p*66.13 1/2*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Col. Stephen F Austins*/person_mentioned**/p* *p*Acct $66.13 1/2*/p*
*/div1*
